Description:
The Security Systems Service Engineer will be in charge of recruiting ,organizing and directing the technical teams involved in the installation, maintenance & configuration of the systems proposed for a project. This includes monitoring the team, instructing technicians and laborers, configuring the system, testing and commissioning, etc. Job Responsibilities:Carrying out quality inspections on jobs
Directing, instructing and supervising the technicians and supervisors.
Liaising with client departments and customers in project execution.
Diagnosing breakdown problems and faults
Carry out installation duties when and where required.
Programming and configuration of the system proposed.
Monitor the project activities and reporting back to the Head of services daily.
Assist the Head of services in preparation of project schedule, revenue calculation, technicians training etc.
Project handing over and preparation of delivery notes, project correspondence etc.
Perform additional assignments per the direct manager's direction.Skills
Skills:
Should have a bachelor's degree (or equivalent) in Electronics or electrical.
Good verbal & written communication in English; Communication skill in Arabic in added advantage.
Good technical knowledge in Low current systems like CCTV/Access Control/intrusion detection systems / X-rays / road blockers, etc.
Ability to work under pressure in a dynamic environment.
Professional presentation skills; self-starter; cooperative attitude; team player.
Highly result orientated with a strong drive to deliver/succeed.
Good organisational and time management skills
Good Computer Knowledge
Fast learner and dedicated.
